short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kumato is a flexible and customizable Pomodoro, Todo and Daily reports productivity suite

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kumato is a productivity suite for making managing day-to-day tasks and activities smooth and effortless. It includes the 3 most useful apps Pomodoro, Todo, and Daily reports.

Pomodoro features:
* Site blocking functionality when the Pomodoro timer is active
* Configurable Pomodoro and break session duration
* Notifications when Pomodoro and break session is complete
* Statistics about completed Pomodoro and break sessions
* Last Pomodoro end-time information
* Affirmations when visiting a blocked site
* Pausing or discarding a Pomodoro session anytime

Todo features:
* Project based todo lists
* Drag and drop able todo items
* Todos 4 level of prioritization 
* Start/pause button for todo items
* Easy todo sorting by priority 
* Advanced URL support for todo descriptions 
* Easy completed todo removing
* Instant transfer option of todos into daily reports list
* Synchronization of todos across the multiple devices using the same Google account

Daily Reports features:
* Project based daily reports lists
* Viewing and editing modes
* Easy clearing of the daily reports list
